ticket.title: RFC-0029 REQ-0010 tiered erasure+BFT reconstruction admissibility closure

tickets.reason: Reconstruction admissibility depends on replay/recovery receipt closure.
Outage continuity replay context provides bounded recovery envelope assumptions.
Cross-RFC CAC traceability overlay is required for reconstruction gate contract integrity.

in_scope: Require erasure decode validity, BFT quorum certification, and SourceTrustSnapshot digest match before reconstruction admission.
Bind RecoveryAdmissibilityReceiptV1 to valid TP-EIO29 temporal authority references.
Classify reconstruction deny outcomes with mandatory failure-mode diagnostics.
Fail closed on any missing recovery proof component or unresolved trust snapshot state.

steps: Integrate erasure, quorum, digest-match, and temporal authority checks into reconstruction gate path.
Implement deny-path diagnostics for ERASURE/BFT failure classes.
Add negatives for insufficient quorum, digest mismatch, and unresolved trust snapshots.

criteria: Reconstruction denies unless decode+quorum+digest+temporal closure is complete.
Insufficient quorum or digest mismatch is fail-closed deny.
Reconstruction failure modes emit deterministic diagnostics for remediation.

notes.security: Availability without trust closure is non-admissible for promotion-critical recovery.
notes.verification: Include chaos fixtures proving fail-closed behavior for quorum and digest mismatch failures.
notes.general: This ticket closes REQ-0010 reconstruction admissibility obligations.
